title: Generate Statement in cart page
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a fan has at least one order in a given renewal group 
AND online statements are allowed for at least one order
WHEN the fan lands on the cart page (Order Details page) for that renewal group
THEN the generate statements option shall be offered for each order that has permission to generate an statement

title: Download PDF
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a fan has the option to Generate Statements for one or more orders
WHEN fan is in cart page
AND they click on generate statement
THEN the invoice PDF will be downloaded to the fan's device

title: Generate statement in confirmation page
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a fan has checked out with one or more orders 
AND online statements are allowed for the orders
WHEN the fan lands on the confirmation page
THEN the generate statements option shall be offered to allow for the fan to generate a new statement that reflects payments.

title: No option to generate statement
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a fan has at least one order in a given renewal group 
AND online statements are not allowed for  one order
WHEN the fan lands on the cart page (Order Details page) for that renewal group
THEN the generate statements option shall  not be offered for all order that does not have permission to generate an statement in both cart and confirmation page

title: Pending Schedule Payment
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a fan has at least one order in a given renewal group
AND online statements are allowed for at least one order
WHEN the fan lands on the cart page (Order Details page) for that renewal group
THEN the generate statements option shall be offered for each order that has permission to generate an statement

title: Verify Statement in cart page
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a fan has at least one order in a given renewal group 
AND online statements are allowed for at least one order
WHEN the fan lands on the cart page (Order Details page) for that renewal group
AND the generate statements option shall be offered for each order that has permission to generate an statement
WHEN fan clicks generate statement
AND statement will be saved in fans Device
THEN verify the following in statement
1.Default delivery is sent in statement
2.Default payment plan is sent
3.Statement header and Images are sent
4.Total amount due is sent

title: Verify statement in Confirmation page
custom_steps:
GIVEN that a fan has at least one order in a given renewal group 
AND online statements are allowed for at least one order
WHEN the fan lands on the cart page (Order Details page) for that renewal group
AND the generate statements option shall be offered for each order that has permission to generate an statement
AND fan change the payment plan from default and save it
AND fan change the delivery method from default and save it
AND fan applies available credit
WHEN fan clicks checkout button
AND on confirmation page
WHEN fan clicks generate statement
AND statement will be saved in fans Device
THEN verify the following in statement
1.Changed delivery is sent in statement
2.Changed payment plan is sent
3.Statement header and Images are sent
4.Total amount due is sent
5.Applied credit is sent
6.Digital wallet item is sent
